import Link from 'next/link'; import { Box, Media, MediaContent, Level, LevelRight, LevelItem, Icon, MediaLeft, MediaRight, Content, Image } from 'bloomer'; import styles from '../styles'; import DropOptions from './DropOptions'; export default function CardItem({ name, area, email, photo, levelColor, id }) { return (

{name}
{area}
{email}

) }
